# Shadow Tentacle (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] ([[Shadow Spells|shadow]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[Book of Experimental Might Wizard Spell Lists|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One shadow

**Duration:** 1 round/level or concentration

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Lords of Darkness (WotC)Â­, pg. 186

As *lesser shadow tentacle*, except the spell creates a shadow tentacle that extends up to 10 feet per caster level (maximum 100 feet) from its anchoring point. The tentacle created by this spell has 40 hit points, AC 18, and can be burst with a Strength check (DC 25). A character can also free himself from the tentacle with an [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] check (DC 22).

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *greater shadow tentacle* to *shadow tentacle* to avoid duplication.
